**Handy commands:
> nvm use v20.5.1
> npx gatsby develop
> Gatsby develop                                          (to run locally)
> Gatsby build                                            (to check)
> cd to public folder and enter: npx http-server -p 5000  (check the site at localhost:5000)
> http://localhost:8000/___graphql                        (to start graphql)
